dlgLine.text: Thanks again for helping to get that burn cleaned, Renee.
It was no problem. You poor guy.
Yeah, um... I just wanted to... give you this.
[Ryan leans in to kiss Renee.]
Whoa! Ha ha... Oh, sweetie - no... that's not going to happen.
But... you kept calling me 'sweetie' and ruffling my hair. I thought you liked me! Why is that funny?
Um... You're just... You're such a nice kid, but... I'm old enough to be your older sister. Your much older sister. I'm sorry...
Um... I have to go.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -
- New Answ -

dlgLine.text: Jeez... Women...

dlgAnsw.text: Yeah, I know...
I wouldn't know.
She's just playing hard to get.
Ha ha ha... That was the funniest thing I've seen since I got here.

dlgLine.text: Jeez...

dlgAnsw.text: You okay?
I know... straight chicks, am I right?
You want my opinion? You should give up. She didn't give you any signs.
Ha ha ha... That was the funniest thing I've seen since I got here.

dlgLine.text: I can't believe she'd reject me like that! I used to be one of the most popular kids in my grade.

dlgAnsw.text: Her loss, man.
Yeah...

dlgLine.text: It's just... I don't want to die before...
You know...

dlgAnsw.text: Oh... I see.
You're a virgin?!

dlgLine.text: Oh... right. You're a... into guys.

dlgAnsw.text: I still know what it's like to be a horny seventeen-year-old.
You have a problem with that?

dlgLine.text: You think?

dlgAnsw.text: Honestly... no.
Yeah, sure - go get her.

dlgLine.text: Don't laugh! Just... Fuck off!

dlgAnsw.text: <Ryan runs off.>

dlgLine.text: No!

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: I will! Thanks for the advice!

dlgAnsw.text: <Ryan runs off after Renee.>

dlgLine.text: Dude - shut up! Not like I haven't done stuff with girls... Just not, you know, all of it.

dlgAnsw.text: Sorry. Continue.
Wow. I would hate to die a virgin.

dlgLine.text: I don't know what to do... I thought that Renee liked me because she's nice and well, she dropped the tweezers and I thought she was... thought she was telling me to check out her ass.

dlgAnsw.text: You're on your own. I am not getting involved in this.
Want my advice? Find a slut.
They think you're a kid. Even without the law, they don't want to fuck a kid.
There's bound to be a girl here that likes you eventually.
Don't go near Renee. Don't make it awkward for her.

dlgLine.text: I guess...

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: I'm not a kid! I'm so tired of hearing that.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: Thanks for nothing!

dlgAnsw.text: <Ryan runs off.>

dlgLine.text: You can't tell me who I can and can't talk to! Fuck you!

dlgAnsw.text: <Ryan runs off.>

dlgLine.text: Like how do I know... a girl's a slut?

dlgAnsw.text: Will she have sex with you for stuff? Then she's a slut.
Ask other guys if she slept with them for no reason at all.
Uh... you know what - forget I said anything.

dlgLine.text: Um... Thanks for your advice.

dlgAnsw.text: No problem. See ya later.
Use it wisely. Good luck - I gotta go.

dlgLine.text: No, not really. And now it's kind of even more awkward, because you asked me.

dlgAnsw.text: You want to talk about it?
If you want to understand the female mind, maybe I can help.

dlgLine.text: Oh, right... You like girls too.

dlgAnsw.text: Yeah, and I've been seventeen, just like you.
Wipe that smile off your face...

dlgLine.text: You're totally wrong. Wait... she wasn't? Dammit.

dlgAnsw.text: Girls can tell these things.
I'm just kidding - go get her!

dlgLine.text: Sorry.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: It's just... well... it's embarrassing.
I, uh... um, I've never... you know. With a girl.

dlgAnsw.text: That's nothing to be ashamed of.
Oh. I... see.
You're a virgin?!

dlgLine.text: Shh! I told you that in confidence!

dlgAnsw.text: Sorry. I was just surprised.
Oh... wait until I tell the other girls.

dlgLine.text: It's just... With things being as bad as they are, I could die like any day. And... I don't want to die without... <Sigh>

dlgAnsw.text: I don't know what to tell you... You should maybe ask a guy.
You're way too young. Look at you - you're just a kid.
I'm sure there's someone else here that feels the same way.
Don't go near Renee. Don't make it awkward for her.
Ah... poor sweetie. I feel so bad for you.

dlgLine.text: What? Fuck you!

dlgAnsw.text: <Ryan runs off.>

dlgLine.text: You think so?

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: Do you?

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: [Ryan leans in and tries to kiss you.]

dlgAnsw.text: Oh my gosh - I didn't mean to give you the wrong idea. I'm just giving you advice.
Whoa - you're a nice kid, but you're not ready for a woman.
What about Renee? I think you should give that a shot.
<Slap Him>

dlgLine.text: I'm sorry...

dlgAnsw.text: It's okay. You'll find someone. Just not me.
I have to go.

dlgLine.text: I'm not a kid! Dammit...

dlgAnsw.text: <Ryan runs off before you can say anything else.>

dlgLine.text: Okay. I guess. I... gotta go.

dlgAnsw.text: <Ryan walks away quickly.>

dlgLine.text: Uh - you do? Oh. Then I'm sorry I tried to, you know. Please don't tell Renee.
I gotta go.

dlgAnsw.text: <Ryan runs off.>

dlgLine.text: I'm sorry!

dlgAnsw.text: <Ryan runs off.>
